name: ASTROVER
description:
Astrover is a endless survival game in space, available on Windows, macOS & Linux. This game is a single player arcade game that has ranking features as well as the popular games you often to play, a game has a futuristic minimalist user interface and is accompanied by an Epic Sountrack.

Features

  • Simple UI
  • Ranked mode
  • Easy to play
  • Epic Soundtrack

Controls

  • ASD : Move
  • W : Defend
  • Space : Fly up

Note :

This game  was made in by a single person, please leave feedback or if any bug is found.
